#summary Manage your wild defenses and monitor the amount of wilds with one click

<h1>Wilds</h1>
Click TOOLS, Click Wilds

Once you click you are shown several columns containing information about all your wilds.  This section is an easy way to manage ALL your wilds’ defenses!
•Wild Type

•Coords

•Traps – how many traps you have

•Mercenaries – Novice, Intermediate, Veteran

•-----Change Defences-----

 o	Click the word “Max” next to the empty field under this heading, 

 o	Click the Down arrow next to the word “None” and select the type of troop you want

 o	Click “Set defenses” At the bottom of the cities wilds.

 o	Repeat per city you have
